plot: After a night of partying at the clubs, Mike "The Situation" and Pauly D. juggle with multiple groups of girls. Meanwhile, Snooki's mother comes to visit and spend some quality time together. When Mrs. Polizzi leaves, Snooki becomes very emotional showing her "true colors". That same night at the bar, all hell breaks loose when one of the housemates goes down.—Emphinix
